Uses of Class
gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.assessment.schema.SchemaAssessment

  • Packages that use SchemaAssessment 
    Package Description
    gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.assessment
    Supports the assessment of XML documents using XML Schema and ISO Schematron definitions.
    gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.assessment.schema
    Provides XML schema-based assessment capabilities.

    • Uses of SchemaAssessment in gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.assessment

      Methods in gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.assessment that return SchemaAssessment 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static SchemaAssessment Factory.newSchemaAssessment​(String derivedRequirementId)  
      static SchemaAssessment Factory.newSchemaAssessment​(String derivedRequirementId, List<? extends Source> schemaSources)
      Constructs a new XML schema-based Assessment that can be used to validate assessed documents against a set of XML schema.
